## SendableEthersLiquity.redeemDebtToken() method

Redeem DebtToken to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
redeemDebtToken(amount: Decimalish, maxRedemptionRate?: Decimalish, overrides?: EthersTransactionOverrides): Promise<SentEthersLiquityTransaction<RedemptionDetails>>;
```

## Parameters

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

amount


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Amount of DebtToken to be redeemed.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

maxRedemptionRate


</td><td>

[Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md)


</td><td>

Maximum acceptable [redemption rate](./lib-base.fees.redemptionrate.md)<!-- -->.


</td></tr>

overrides


</td><td>

[EthersTransactionOverrides](./lib-ethers.etherstransactionoverrides.md)


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[SentEthersLiquityTransaction](./lib-ethers.sentethersliquitytransaction.md)<!-- -->&lt;[RedemptionDetails](./lib-base.redemptiondetails.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxRedemptionRate` is omitted, the current redemption rate (based on `amount`<!-- -->) plus 0.1% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
